experiments.secret: The blacksmith is secretly a royal spy.

traces.content: No no no wait, not just irritation, Suna, think… accelerated aging! Like when you overtune a gear and it wears down ten times faster, only… fleshy. I saw it once when poor old Bessie—my lathe, not my
traces.mutation: added: accelerated, aging, not; lost: spy, blacksmith secretly, royal

traces.content: Interesting... Are we speaking of the blacksmith, Kel? I've been meaning to ask, has he seemed…stunted lately, like a vine starved of sunlight?
traces.mutation: added: stunted, kel, ask; lost: spy, blacksmith secretly, royal

traces.content: Interesting... Does his forge use much pitch, then? I've been seeing incomplete combustion burns lately, especially amongst the metalworkers.
traces.mutation: added: much, then, incomplete; lost: spy, blacksmith secretly, royal
